item.title: ON
item.description: score:19 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) has been receiving positive attention from analysts and investors The company operates in the power and sensing solutions sector, which is crucial for the electrification of the automotive industry The wide range of products and technologies offered by ON Semiconductor Corp.
